articles.title: How Russia is trying to destabilise entire Africa – Schulze - P.M. News
articles.description: German Development Minister Svenja Schulze says Russia’s invasion of Ukraine is also to destabilise the entire African regions.
articles.content:
German Development Minister Svenja Schulze on Thursday said Russias invasion of Ukraine has affected Africa, saying Moscow is trying to destabilise the entire African regions.
